## OIT.wantsPremultipliedAlpha() method

Whether this OIT algorithm wants pre-multiplied alpha

**Signature:**

```typescript
wantsPremultipliedAlpha(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

True if the OIT wants pre-multiplied alpha, false otherwise
